sensors

Class MyLightSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • lejos.nxt.LightSensor
      • sensors.MyLightSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UpdatingSensor

    public class MyLightSensor
extends lejos.nxt.LightSensor
implements UpdatingSensor
    This class holds all the utilities to control the light sensor. Also this is a boundary class for the actual light sensor
    Since:
    01-04-2014
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Robert Bezem
